summoned with #88 10 False Horrors (unresearchable), #665 False Horror (Alteration 6)

The False Horror is a frightening, illusionary Horror. Ordinary men will surely falter at the sight of a Horror, but those brave enough to fight the apparition will find it quite vulnerable.
